comment.body: Of course, consider that your source is the World Bank (take it with a grain of salt). Then again, living in the USA, I can account for some of the poverty here, but more than anything, the entitlement attitude that has been picking up steam over the years. It has become free handouts without thinking about the future. It is consuming the nation.

If you are on the open web, it has become a massive spy operation. Social media often gives away who you are, and there is no getting around that for most. Once you use your real name or information, you are tagged and logged. Lots of fun, especially for the stupid.
